name: Sabrina Trinidad Panlilio
text: "In a statement, the central bank said that the practice actually constitutes a crime under Philippine law. Citing R.A. 10175, otherwise known as the Cybercrime Prevention Act of 2012, the bank explained that text message spamming falls under the category of unsolicited commercial communications. "  http://cnnphilippines.com/business/2015/04/22/BSP-warns-public-text-spam.html
